answers.answer: yes me, they found out yesterday and my Dr send me to the hospital for an observation for 24hrs. they gave me steroids because im 32 weeks and if my BP doesnt get better ill have a csecti
csection* and they want my lilboys lungs to develop faster
Do u think mine will go down by this Thursday? Just an opinion
How high was your blood pressures?
Well he didn't tell me but and I didn't ask, guess that was a bad choice not to :/

I had preeclampsia with my first and wasn't made aware until 3 minutes after I and him! My BP skyrocketed to 200+/100+ I'm 30w5d and my BP is already on the rise again. It was 143/96 yesterday (second appointment in 3 weeks both with elevated BP) No protein in urine yet, but I so so so so so DO NOT want an emergency csection. I want another vaginal delivery!
I already have a cSection now a very active 4 yr old I cannot be opened and take care of both kids. That's why I am so terrified :(

Don't be terrified.  You can manage it if you have to have a c section.  Your husband can help out when he's home from work,  and run the errands,  and take the 4 year old with him.4 years old is a great age - you don't have to lift him in to the tub or out of a crib,  he can get himself in and out of where he needs to be.  Or she - don't know which your 4 year old is.I had a c section with an 18 month old at home,  and then again with a 4 and 5 year old at home and you can do it.  Things just sort of move at a slower pace.

Thank you @ rockrose  I appreciate u sharing your mother methods with me :) I started packing for the hospital today & getting things settled around the house for my husband and son. Hopefully they will make it with out me

question: Hi ladies I am 37+2. Yesturday  I had a doctors appointment and my BP was high. In a week I gained 2 1/2 pounds. I have been feeling light headed to the point where I feel that I can't be standing(happendsOften) my oB gave me a follow up for this Thursday, in order to see if my BP has returned to normal or else I will most likely be ordered to have a cSection. Anyone else go through this?
title: PossiblePreeclampsia
